cab.content: Military Secret.imam ' ''jjh'om Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,:f Vdth January 1920.(Received 21st.)714. 19th January. Malleson wires 15th January, repeating Tehran :--1. The Afghan troops in Merv are reported under orders to return to their own country.2. German uniforms are being worn by new Bolshevik troops from centre.Several German officers have gone to Krasnovodsk front.
